duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform audits of low to moderate complexity information system audits under the direction of the audit lead or audit manager.
Assist or lead in audits related to IT process, infrastructure, ITGC (Information Technology General Controls), and pre and post implementation reviews.
Coordinate and effectively communicate with a diversified customer base.
Liaise with IT business staff to ensure full understanding of data flow, security policies and procedures, data integrity, physical and logical system security.
Provide input into the annual IT audit risk assessment and development of the annual audit plan.
Interact effectively with associates, mid-level management, and other personnel within the organization.
Recognize and understand audit concerns of auditees and work together to a mutual resolution while maintaining independence.
Mentor on IT-related processes and business drivers.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor degree in Information Systems, Computer Science, Accounting, Finance, or other related business degree. Advanced degree and/or professional certifications such as CISA, CISSP, CISM, CFE, CIA or other is preferred.
